The tidyverse package `{ggplot2}` uses the 'grammar of graphics' to separate plots into seven components.

## Learning objectives

* Learn the grammar of graphics
* Pipe tidy data into ggplots
* Map data columns to plots
* Select and order geometric objects to represent data
